an5.226:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, adinava kulupakassa bhikkhuno ativelam kulesu samsatthassa viharato.
an5.226:1.7: otinnacittassetam patikankham: ‘anabhirato va brahmacariyam carissati annataram va sankilittham apattim apajjissati sikkham va paccakkhaya hinayavattissati’.
an5.226:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca adinava kulupakassa bhikkhuno ativelam kulesu samsatthassa viharato”ti.
